name: Extremophile (Teulis)
description:
Runner-up for gameplay in the 2023 Global Game Jam at Ga Tech.

A platformer where, when you die,  your corpses allow you to continue with the game.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, and x to shoot spores that grow mushrooms on glowing walls.

Credits:

Tristan (Teulis): Programming, Unity, Animation, Art, Debugging

WaluigiGoesWa: Programmer: character physics, momentum from hazards (https://waluigigoeswa.itch.io/)

Louis: Game Design, Level Design

Danny: Programming, UI, Projectile mechanics

Max W (@maxwoo): Artwork: Character Sprites & Designs, Story

Cortland: Audio: Music, Sound Effects
